description: Avantree 3 in 1 in car holder kit is design to provide a clear visibility of your device and fingertip access to your applications no matter you attach to windshield or dashboard or mount at air vent.Strong and secure grip make your phone or device will not fall while driving.

features: * 3 in 1 in car holder mount with windshield dashboard and air * vent for cellphone. gps, pad etc. * Universal holder fits most cellphone & PDAS wihtin width 45 mm to 105 mm * You can use this holder without removing your device case * Adjustable arm for best viewing angle, joint design for differnet angles adjustment. * Easy to attach & secure on windshield / dashboard /air vent without tools.
